Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and achieve remarkable results. Given its high quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is an opportunity to acquire a product worth over $1200000 at a substantial discount. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your organization and answer any questions you might have. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
